prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Aejaz Ahmed Vaccal                        
Mobile: +91 7207837057; E-Mail: ahmedaejaz70@gmail.com                                                                                                                
Senior Professional: Automation/ AI/Cloud                                                                                                                              
 Location Preference: Any
Profile Summary
• Seasoned QA Manager (Technical/Automation) at Persistent Systems, having a total of 14 years of QA experience 
• Certified as SAFe 6 Agilist & Robotic Process Automation Advanced certification (Ui Path)
• UiPath Test Suite to automate testing processes across applications.
• UiPath Automation Cloud via web-based interface.
• Test Automation using Selenium and Java and fair experience in manual testing
• Technical skills - Python, Azure DevOps, Appium, and MS Copilot, AWS code whisperer, AI prompt engineering
• Implemented all types of testing like functional, regression, Database, API and system testing.
• PeopleSoft HRMS -Tester of Schemas, Utility for transformation testing, Tester for handlers
• PeopleSoft Utility to send master, Integration point testing that is automated, simple post utility.
• Experienced in setting up Automation testing frameworks - TDD, BDD, Rest assured, Azure DevOps
• Experienced in Test Planning, Test Strategy
• Motivate team to innovate new ideas, adhere to Quality measures, Quality tools and coaching.
• Experienced in Manual testing, UI, Integration testing, Cloud testing, Security Testing, CI/CD, Audits
• B2B communication, Client and stake holder management, Process optimization, SAP Test Management, SAP S/4 HANA, SAP Enable Now
• Expertise in tools like HP ALM, JIRA, CA Agile Central, Rally, Excel macros
• Technologies - .NET, Oracle, IBM MDM, Test NG, Jenkins, Git Hub, OWASP, Agile, Kanban, ETL,  Katalon, Gen AI tools.
• Cloud services such as GKE, Containers and k8s
Professional Experience
Persistent Systems
completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
